detail.description: Apcotex Industries Ltd is a leading producer of Synthetic Rubber (Nitrile Rubber, High Styrene Rubber, Nitrile Polyblends and Nitrile Powder) and Synthetic Latex (XSB Latex, VP Latex, Styrene Acrylics, and Nitrile Latex) in India.[1]
